title: Password Generator
description: A secure password generator with customization features like length, character types, and a copy button. Built with a clean and responsive UI.

title: E-Commerce Web App
description: A full-stack e-commerce website with Spring Boot backend, REST APIs, and MySQL for product, user, and order management.

title: News4U App
description: A responsive news app built with React.js and REST APIs. Displays real-time news by category with smooth UI and routing.
